item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 28, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: I built a hardware processor that runs Python (637 points | 180 comments)
2. Reports of the death of California High-Speed Rail have been greatly exaggerated (16 points | 3 comments)
3. Widespread power outage in Spain and Portugal (825 points | 715 comments)
4. Show HN: A pure WebGL image editor with filters, crop and perspective correction (73 points | 21 comments)
5. Vision Transformers Need Registers (39 points | 7 comments)
6. Show HN: Sim Studio – Open-Source Agent Workflow GUI (59 points | 15 comments)
7. Show HN: Web-eval-agent – Let the coding agent debug itself (40 points | 9 comments)
8. Uncovering the mechanics of The Games: Winter Challenge (214 points | 94 comments)
9. Show HN: Heart Rate Zones Plus – The first iOS app I ever developed (15 points | 3 comments)
10. Activeloop (YC S18) Is Hiring VP of Engineering in Mountain View (On-Site) ( | hide)
11. The Side Hustle From Hell (144 points | 74 comments)
12. Giving Software Away for Free (12 points | 2 comments)
13. Tiny-LLM – a course of serving LLM on Apple Silicon for systems engineers (144 points | 13 comments)

15. Generating Mazes with Inductive Graphs (2017) (8 points | 2 comments)

20. Internet in a Box (833 points | 208 comments)
21. Show HN: I made a web-based, free alternative to Screen Studio (408 points | 97 comments)
22. AI helps unravel a cause of Alzheimer’s and identify a therapeutic candidate (303 points | 149 comments)
23. Reality Check (80 points | 48 comments)
24. Ask HN: What are you working on? (April 2025) (249 points | 717 comments)
25. How a single line of code could brick your iPhone (449 points | 109 comments)
26. Presentation Slides with Markdown (198 points | 70 comments)
27. Relational Graph Transformers (8 points | discuss)
28. Inference-Aware Fine-Tuning for Best-of-N Sampling in Large Language Models (65 points | 8 comments)
29. New material gives copper superalloy-like strength (160 points | 90 comments)
30. Read the Obits (273 points | 109 comments)
